label: PRF – Pending Quotations
description: Submitted requests waiting for supplier quotations.

label: PO Sent – Awaiting Delivery
description: Purchase Orders sent to vendors; goods/services not yet delivered.

label: Partially Received – Awaiting Balance
description: Items/services received in part. Pending full delivery.

label: Goods/Services Received – Pending Payment
description: Goods/services fully received. Bills pending or under payment processing.
